input_text:
Job Title: Distribution Center Supervisor - Second Shift

Location: Galesburg, IL

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Management, Manufacturing

Description:
Overall Purpose and Main Objectives

Maintaining work flow in all areas of the warehouse. Supervise 20-30 warehouse associates on Second Shift (230p to 11p M-F). Create and maintain a safe work environment that supports continuous improvement.

Responsibilities

Ensure products are received, picked, packed, and shipped as accurately/timely as possible.Support and develop skills of associates. Put customer satisfaction as a priority.Use effective communication, interpersonal, and leadership skills to promote positive group operations and relationshipsAssist associates with cross training for various jobs. Ensure new hires are properly trained.Cross-train associates for various functions within the warehouse.Ensure needed supplies, tools, and equipment are available to associatesMaintain and support the confidentiality of employee and company records. Maintain a clean, safe, work area.Instill pride, respect, and teamwork among associates. Maintain and support Blick Art Materials policies and procedures. 


Education/Experience

High school diploma or equivalency required.Associates Degree along with 3-5 years supervisory experience preferred.


Qualification Requirements

Excellent written and oral communication skills. Strong interpersonal skills and ability to work with others. Able to handle multiple tasks simultaneously. Required personal computer skills, MS Word, MS Excel, and MS Outlook.Ability to work effectively with team members.Effective leadership and decision making skills.Intermediate math skills.


Benefits Include

Medical/Dental/Vision Insurance401K & Profit Sharing PlanIncentive Bonus PlansPaid Holidays & Paid Time OffPaid Parental LeaveShort-Term/Long-Term DisabilityTraining OpportunitiesBasic & Optional Life InsuranceEmployee Discount


Founded in 1911, Blick Art Materials is in its third generation of family ownership, and is the largest and oldest provider of art supplies in the United States.

At Blick Art Materials, our family owners and dedicated staff support the Visual Art Community by providing the widest selection of art supplies at the lowest prices. With extraordinary service and integrity, we strive to provide artists, educators, students, and our employees with the tools, assistance, and training they need to grow, innovate, and reach their creative potential.

Experience Level (if available): Mid-Senior level

output_json.title: Distribution Center Supervisor - Second Shift
output_json.summary: Supervise 20-30 warehouse associates on Second Shift, ensuring accurate and timely product handling, and maintaining a safe work environment.
job_responsibilities: Maintain work flow in all areas of the warehouse
Create and maintain a safe work environment
Support and develop skills of associates
Put customer satisfaction as a priority
Use effective communication, interpersonal, and leadership skills
Promote positive group operations and relationships
Ensure new hires are properly trained
Ensure availability of supplies, tools, and equipment
Maintain confidentiality of employee and company records
Maintain a clean, safe work area
Instill pride, respect, and teamwork among associates
Maintain and support Blick Art Materials policies and procedures
output_json.company_information: Blick Art Materials is a third-generation family-owned business, the largest and oldest provider of art supplies in the United States.
